content: row 5 fo and make pupil sew eye to head between the hanging chain and the mouth opening tentacles =  cut 24 strands of yarn each should have a length of 4 to 5 inches 1 insert your hook into the unused front loops in round 6 of the body fold the yarn over the hook and pull halfway through the loop to center the string 2 make a quick knot to secure the string and prevent it from falling out while displayed 3 repeat steps 1 and 2 until all open loops have been filled fluff/straighten strands as needed completed ghostly mini yipyip
